sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La situation économique se stabilise progressivement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The economic situation is gradually stabilizing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè jǐnjí qíngkuàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une situation d'urgence.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an emergency situation.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Viens immédiatement, s'il te plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please come over immediately.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce film est trop effrayant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That movie is too scary.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng dài wǒ xiàng tā wènhòu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Transmets-lui mes salutations, s'il te plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please send him my regards.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez ne pas déranger le travail des autres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please don't interfere with others' work.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La fête du travail est un jour férié.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Labor Day is a public holiday.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shǎo shuō fèihuà, kuài kāishǐ gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Arrête de dire des bêtises et mets-toi au travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Stop talking nonsense and start working.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La monnaie circule sur le marché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Currency circulates in the market.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 两国之间的贸易很频繁。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Liǎng guó zhījiān de màoyì hěn pínfán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le commerce entre les deux pays est très fréquent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Trade between the two countries is very frequent.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les efforts seront forcément récompensés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hard work will inevitably be rewarded.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les soldats doivent obéir aux ordres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Soldiers must obey orders.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 她是一位著名的电影明星。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi zhùmíng de diànyǐng míngxīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une célèbre star de cinéma.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a famous movie star.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il étudie dans une université officielle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He studies at a formal university.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā duì xīnlǐxué hěn gǎn xìngqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'intéresse beaucoup à la psychologie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is very interested in psychology.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiān lěng le, yào gài hòu bèizi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait froid, il faut se couvrir d'une couette épaisse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's cold, you should use a thick quilt.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这家店的商品种类很多。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā diàn de shāngpǐn zhǒnglèi hěn duō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce magasin propose une grande variété de produits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This store has a wide variety of products.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons travailler dur pour atteindre notre objectif.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must work hard to achieve our goal.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 两人之间产生了一些摩擦。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Liǎng rén zhījiān chǎnshēng le yīxiē mócā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a eu quelques frictions entre les deux personnes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There was some friction between the two people.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La compagnie d'assurance compensera les pertes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The insurance company will compensate for the losses.
